description: Global description: The Data Model is intended to provide information about ports that can accommodate pleasure craft, commerce or passenger transport. It permit to represent the parameters of each port, its location, its mooring capacities and the free or paid services associated with it provided directly by the port or by professionals working on or near the port.

contents.name: areaServed
contents.description: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: authorizedPropulsion
contents.description: A Type of propulsions authorized to enter in the harbor. A combination of motor, sail, electric, oar, nuclear, lng, lpg, other
contents.comment: Since DTDLv2 doesn't support arrays for Properties, a single string will be used.

contents.name: boatSupplyingServices
contents.description: Description of the complementary supplying services for the boat offered by professionals working on or near the harbor. A combination of guarding, fuelStation, fuelTankerTruck , drinkingWaterTankerTruck, provisioning, dryFairing, waterFairing, repair, expertise, gangways, liftingCranes, towing, wasteWaterPumping, boatConveying, boatTransfer, other
contents.comment: Since DTDLv2 doesn't support arrays for Properties, a single string will be used.

contents.name: contractingAuthority
contents.description: Name of the contracting authority

contents.name: contractingCompany
contents.description: The Contracting Company responsible of the management of the port.

contents.name: currencyAccepted
contents.description: A combination of a list of active codes defined in the model Norme ISO 4217, Crypto Currencies , [Exchange Trading System](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Local_exchange_trading_system
contents.comment: Since DTDLv2 doesn't support arrays for Properties, a single string will be used.

contents.name: dateLastReported
contents.description: The date and time of this report in ISO8601 UTC format. It can be represented by a specific time instant or by an ISO8601 interval

contents.name: electricTransport
contents.description: List of the different types of electric transport proposed by the city. A combination of electricCar, electricBycicle, electricMotorBike, electricScooter
contents.comment: Since DTDLv2 doesn't support arrays for Properties, a single string will be used.

contents.name: facilities
contents.description: Description of the proposed facilities on the harbor. A combination of : toilets, showers, laundry, telephone, dustbins, dumpsters, container, selectiveSortingWaste, electricTerminal, waterTerminal, indoorRoomReservation, wifi, other
contents.comment: Since DTDLv2 doesn't support arrays for Properties, a single string will be used.

contents.name: maxDraft
contents.description: A Maximum draft allowed to access the harbor

contents.name: maxLength
contents.description: A Maximum length allowed to access the harbor

contents.name: minLength
contents.description: A Minimum length allowed to access the harbor

contents.name: maxWidth
contents.description: A Maximum width allowed to access the harbor

contents.name: maxTonnage
contents.description: Maximum tonnage authorized to access the harbor

contents.name: nearbyServices
contents.description: Description of the additional services on the geographical area on or near the harbor. A combination of :touristOffice, fittingsStores, travelAgency, exchangeOffice, medicalOffice, pharmacy, groceryStores, restaurants, presses, bar, shops, seaExcursions, cityTour, touristicExcursions, others
contents.comment: Since DTDLv2 doesn't support arrays for Properties, a single string will be used.

contents.name: numberOfPlace
contents.description: Total number of place in the harbor.

contents.name: openingHoursSpecification
contents.description: A structured value providing information about the opening hours of a place or a certain service inside a place.

contents.name: paymentAccepted
contents.description: Accepted payment. A combination of a list of active codes defined in the model : Cash, CreditCard, CryptoCurrency, other
contents.comment: Since DTDLv2 doesn't support arrays for Properties, a single string will be used.

contents.name: portServicesProvided
contents.description: Description of the services provided directly by the harbor. A combination of : harborOffice, weather, customsServices, porters, boatRingRental, mooringAssistance, handlingAssistance, publicWifi, privateWifi, other
contents.comment: Since DTDLv2 doesn't support arrays for Properties, a single string will be used.

contents.name: refBoatAuthorized
contents.description: Reference to a list of Entity.

contents.name: refBoatPlaceAvailable
contents.description: Reference to a list of Entity.

contents.name: refBoatPlacePricing
contents.description: Reference to a list of Entity.

contents.name: refDevice
contents.description: Reference to the Main Entity Device if used as second link

contents.name: refPointOfInterest
contents.description: Point of Interest that the element has relation to

contents.name: rentalSaleServices
contents.description: ADescription of services provided by professional sales or rental agencies on the geographical area on or near the harbor. A combination of : boatRental, boatSale, jetSkiRental, jetSkiSale, carRental, luxuryCarRental, vanRental, bikeRental, scooterRental, Caddie, palletTransport, other
contents.comment: Since DTDLv2 doesn't support arrays for Properties, a single string will be used.

contents.name: routeType
contents.description: List of the different types of urban transport Mode (Metro, Bus, Tram, ...) from the urban transport Mode GFTS standard STOP. A combination of values composed only of the attribute 'description' tram(0), metro(1), train(2), bus(3), ferry(4), cableTram(5), cableCar(6), funicular(7), trolleybus(11), monorail(12)
contents.comment: Since DTDLv2 doesn't support arrays for Properties, a single string will be used.

contents.name: transportServices
contents.description: Description of the services provided for dedicated transport and shuttle services. A combination of : arking, shuttlesToAirport, shuttlesToRailway, internalShuttles, taxis, heliport, other
contents.comment: Since DTDLv2 doesn't support arrays for Properties, a single string will be used.

contents.name: type
contents.description: It has to be 'SeaPort'

contents.name: typeOfPort
contents.description: A Type of harbor. A combination of : marina, merchandise, cruise, ferry, passengers, yachting, fishing, military, river, other
contents.comment: Required property. Since DTDLv2 doesn't support arrays for Properties, a single string will be used.

contents.name: webSite
contents.description: Link to the official website of the harbor for more information.
